text: A few years ago my grandfather used to live here and we would always come to his house to play in the pool or walk around the place and sometimes go to the park nearby and White Sands or downtown east. We would also go to the playground beside our block to play. All I can remember from this place are good times and good vibes. Those were some of the best years of my life and I absolutely love this place. ❤️
One of the affordable condos in pasir ris, value for money, near to amenities and has quiet surrounding

I would like to extend my heartfelt gratitude to Mr. Aliff for his exceptional assistance and professionalism as we prepare to move into Watercolours Condo on 10 January 2025. From the moment I reached out with my questions and concerns, he demonstrated promptness and a genuine commitment to addressing every detail.

Mr. Aliff's swift responses and clear guidance have been invaluable in ensuring a smooth transition to our new home. His advice on the dos and don’ts—from maintaining the condo’s rules and regulations to fostering a harmonious community environment—has provided us with confidence and clarity. He also offered practical tips to settle in comfortably, such as managing utilities, maximizing condo facilities, and respecting shared spaces.

His professionalism and dedication truly stand out, making this process seamless and stress-free. I highly recommend Mr. Aliff to anyone seeking guidance or support regarding Watercolours Condo. Thank you for going above and beyond, Mr. Aliff—you have made our journey to a new chapter so much easier!
Tranquil place. Near the beach, Downtown east n MRT. It is vey quiet and it feels like you're in a resort island.  Very windy too as the beach is just a 5 min walk.
Has very nice pool for kids, the gym is also a must try.
